column2: North Carolina cites Duke Energy in coal ash spill Feb 28 State regulators in North Carolina on Friday said Duke Energy Corp violated environmental laws and could face quotidian fines after a massive spill of toxic coal ash this month contaminated water and wildlife in the Dan River. ~
